resources

Class Model

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • resources.Model

  • public class Model
extends java.util.Observable
    This class encapsulates the data model of a very simple data collection protocol. The model has three possible states: init state (has an associated sting containing initial instructions), elicitation state (has an associated ordered set of prompts), and end state (has an associated final message). This class provides services for iterating over the ordered set of prompts. This Model is an Observable.
    Author:
    mb

    • Constructor Detail

      • Model

        public Model()
        Create an instance of this model. The iterator over the prompts has not been initialized.

    • Method Detail

      • getCurrentPrompt

        public java.lang.String getCurrentPrompt()
        Returns:
        the prompt that is current in the iteration.

      • getPromptRelativePositionString

        public java.lang.String getPromptRelativePositionString()
        Returns:
        a string which indicates, via a stylized string, the position of the prompt that is current in the iteration, relative to all prompts. For example: "(Prompt 2/9): " The numerator of the fraction will be less than or equal to the denominator.

      • setPromptToNext

        public void setPromptToNext()
        Advances the iterator to the next prompt. Should ensure first that the iterator has not reached past the end of the set of prompts.

      • isPromptsRemaining

        public boolean isPromptsRemaining()
        Returns:
        whether the iterator has reached past the end of the set of prompts.

      • recordDuration

        public void recordDuration()
        Causes a message to printed to a PrintStream with current prompt and elapsed time. Pre - the method recordStopTimeStamp() has been invoked after recordStartTimeStamp()

      • setState

        public void setState(int modelState)
        Parameters:
        modelState - the state for the model. Passed parameter must be one of the class fields. Mutate the current state of this model.

      • getCurrentState

        public int getCurrentState()
        Returns:
        the current state of this model (value will be one of the class fields).

      • getInitMsg

        public java.lang.String getInitMsg()
        Returns:
        the initialization message associated with the INIT_STATE of this model.

      • setPromptToFirst

        public void setPromptToFirst()
        Initiates the iterator over the prompts.

      • getEndMsg

        public java.lang.String getEndMsg()
        Returns:
        the finish message associated with the END_STATE of this model.

      • recordStopTimeStamp

        public void recordStopTimeStamp()
        Tell this model to start recording elapsed time.

      • recordStartTimeStamp

        public void recordStartTimeStamp()
        Tell this model to stop recording elapsed time.
